author: Marti
content:
Hi Andreas --

This is such a lovely image!! I love the shallow depth of field and the color triad of magenta, soft green and blue. It is such a beautiful way to show that spring is on the way. I also like the focus point being in the midst of the flowers, rather than at the front -- creates a tender softness all around.

"Tenderly" -- especially Billie Holiday's version -- is just the perfect song to accompany this image.

Hope you are feeling better!
Marti
